abilities.name: Carnivore
abilities.description: Innate: Whenever Cho'Gath kills an enemy unit or destroys an enemy structure, he  heals for 20 − 71 (based on level) and restores  3.5 − 7.75 (based on level) mana.
descriptions: Innate: Whenever Cho'Gath kills an enemy unit or destroys an enemy structure, he  heals for 20 − 71 (based on level) and restores  3.5 − 7.75 (based on level) mana.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.description: Active: Cho'Gath gains  sight of the target area which, after a 0.627 seconds delay, he makes rupture dealing magic damage and  knocking up enemies within for 1 second, then  slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds afterwards.
descriptions: Active: Cho'Gath gains  sight of the target area which, after a 0.627 seconds delay, he makes rupture dealing magic damage and  knocking up enemies within for 1 second, then  slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds afterwards.

abilities.name: Feral Scream
abilities.description: Active: Cho'Gath roars in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone.
descriptions: Active: Cho'Gath roars in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone.
Enemy  champions and  Rift Scuttlers hit are also  silenced for a duration.

abilities.name: Vorpal Spikes
abilities.description: Active: Cho'Gath's next 3 basic attacks within 6 seconds have  50 bonus range and launch a volley of spikes in a line in the direction of the target, dealing magic damage and applying a decaying  slow over the next 1.5 seconds to enemies hit.
abilities.leveling: Magic Damage:»22 / 37 / 52 / 67 / 82 (+ 30% AP) (+ 3% (+ 0.5% per Feast stack) of target's maximum health)«Maximum Damage:66 / 111 / 156 / 201 / 246 (+ 90% AP) (+ 9% (+ 1.5% per Feast stack) of target's maximum health)Slow:30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50%
levelings: Magic Damage:»22 / 37 / 52 / 67 / 82 (+ 30% AP) (+ 3% (+ 0.5% per  Feast stack) of target's maximum health)«Maximum Damage:66 / 111 / 156 / 201 / 246 (+ 90% AP) (+ 9% (+ 1.5% per  Feast stack) of target's maximum health)Slow:30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50%
descriptions: Active: Cho'Gath's next 3 basic attacks within 6 seconds have  50 bonus range and launch a volley of spikes in a line in the direction of the target, dealing magic damage and applying a decaying  slow over the next 1.5 seconds to enemies hit.
Vorpal Spikes  resets Cho'Gath's basic attack timer.

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.description: Active: Cho'Gath attempts to eat the target enemy, dealing  true damage. Against non-champions, the base damage is increased to 1000.
abilities.leveling: True Damage to Champions:300 / 475 / 650 (+ 50% AP) (+ 10% bonus health)
levelings: True Damage to Champions:300 / 475 / 650 (+ 50% AP) (+ 10% bonus health)

Bonus Health Per Stack:80 / 120 / 160 bonus health
Bonus Attack Range Per Stack:4.62 / 5.38 / 6.15 / 6.92 / 7.69
Bonus Size Per Stack:6 / 7 / 8 / 9 / 10%
descriptions: Active: Cho'Gath attempts to eat the target enemy, dealing  true damage. Against non-champions, the base damage is increased to 1000.
If Feast kills its target, Cho'Gath gains a Feast stack. Only 6 stacks can be gained from non-epic  monsters or  minions.
Each stack of Feast grants Cho'Gath  bonus health as well as  bonus attack range and increased size, capping at  75 bonus attack range and 100% increased size.

name: Cho'Gath
title: the Terror of the Void
blurb: From the moment Cho'Gath first emerged into the harsh light of Runeterra's sun, the beast was driven by the most pure and insatiable hunger. A perfect expression of the Void's desire to consume all life, Cho'Gath's complex biology quickly converts...
